[H1]Tantabus[\H1] [BOLD]Anathema of the Dream Realm[\BOLD] [BOLD]Lived: [\BOLD] Luna's Return, Year 1 - ???? [PARAGRAPH:2][BOLD]Background:[\BOLD] [TAB]The Tantabus is a tupla - a kind of spiritual/mental-world being - created by Princess Luna shortly after her Reunification with her sister, Celestia. [PARAGRAPH:1]Luna, feeling immense guilt for her near-victory as Nightmare Moon, intended for Tantabus to ensure her atonement through the suffering of nightmares, each and every night. [PARAGRAPH:1]At first, Tantabus is successful in its mission to punish Luna with endless nightmares. Perhaps too successful... [PARAGRAPH:1]In one such nightmare, where Luna-as-Nightmare-Moon is seemingly defeated and rescued by the Elements, Tantabus learns of the existance of other ponies besides its creator, including Twilight Sparkle and her friends, the Elements of Harmony. [PARAGRAPH:1]As it learns more about the world from Luna's memories, Tantabus easily assimilates Luna's ability to dream-walk. The energy being, single-mindedly following its directive, reshapes the pleasant dreamscapes of Twilight and her friends into terrible nightmares as it grows in power. [PARAGRAPH:1]Twilight and her friends contact Luna about the bete noir of their nightmares, and the princess uses her powerful magic to bring everypony together to stop Tantabus from escaping the dream realm and turning all of Equestria into a living nightmare. [PARAGRAPH:1]Working together alongside the citizens of Ponyville, Twilight and her friends banish the tupla and Luna's feelings of guilt that empowered it, sealing the energy being inside the realm of dreams for all time. [PARAGRAPH:1]...Or did they? [PARAGRAPH:1]Eventually, the princesses decide to retire and pass on their abilities to the newest Equestrian Princess, Twilight Sparkle. [PARAGRAPH:1]Seemingly forgotten, Tantabus continued to grow and learn from her interactions with Princess Celestia, the Elements, and the ponies of Equestria. The Alicorn of Dreams, now fully-reformed, sought a new goal to devote herself to. [PARAGRAPH:1]One fateful day, when the Elements became as legends within history and the forces of darkness and disharmony were once more at their most powerful, Tantabus broke free from the magic seal... [PARAGRAPH:1]And with its new-found freedom in the realm of dreams, what shall Tantabus do now?
